channel.title: Definitional Hierarchy on RIDDL Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Definitional Hierarchy on RIDDL Documentation

item.title: Root
item.author: reid@reactific.com (Reid Spencer)
item.description: At the root (file) level you can only do two things: include definitions from another file or define a domain. For example: include "other-file" domain foo is { ??? } ```
